name: PandoPartner
description: PandoPartner provides simplified and modernized sponsorship management. The platform helps sports organizations centralize their sponsorship data and activities - leading to more automation and efficiency on the back end of sponsorship management.
one_liner: PandoPartner provides simplified and modernized sponsorship management. The platform helps sports organizations centralize their sponsorship data and activities - leading to more automation and efficiency on the back end of sponsorship management.
